item.title: Will someone please help?
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

like owner purez said give us some infrormation on what kind of skill/comabats your talking about and maybe even the source name?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 10:36:19 am[/size][hr]go to ur client.java and serth for
totalexp
u will see it

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 18);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(QQQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerSlayer);
}
TotalExp = (double)(QQQhitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
chage QQQ to ur exp
searth again for totalexp and do it again

maybe this could help

Read full topic
